description.en: Don’t get confused with the model name. This S5+ will leave his younger brother S7 far behind in mining power, but it will cost you.
description.cn: 不要让与型号名称混淆你，这款S5 +比S7在挖矿能力上远远落后。
description.es: Don’t get confused with the model name. This S5+ will leave his younger brother S7 far behind in mining power, but it will cost you.
description.pt: Don’t get confused with the model name. This S5+ will leave his younger brother S7 far behind in mining power, but it will cost you.

description.en: Being the direct competitor of the R4, this miner provides you with 0.2Th/s greater speed for only 2.5 RLT more. If you have money, you might want to spend it on this nice little machine.
description.cn: Being the direct competitor of the R4, this miner provides you with 0.2Th/s greater speed for only 2.5 RLT more. If you have money, you might want to spend it on this nice little machine.

description.en: The Mergedge developers are raising the stakes! Are you a hardcore miner? Then this one is just for you!
description.cn: The Mergedge developers are raising the stakes! Are you a hardcore miner? Then this one is just for you!

description.en: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.
description.cn: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.

description.pt: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.

description.en: A bunch of coins behind every corner — new version of The Maze! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Ancient Myths. Created by Keimax
description.cn: A bunch of coins behind every corner — new version of The Maze! This miner is one of the ten selected winners of the Miners Art Contest: Ancient Myths. Created by Keimax

description.en: It’s slimy and shaky. Try to hold!
description.cn: It’s slimy and shaky. Try to hold!
description.es: It’s slimy and shaky. Try to hold!
description.pt: It’s slimy and shaky. Try to hold!

description.en: Egyptian culture, so familiar, but yet still mysterious. The Sphinx as the symbol of wisdom, and the Ankh, as the symbol of eternity - this is all you need to mine coins! By Andri

description.en: Jet-Black Rack is created for true connoisseurs of stylish furniture. Place your miners here and enjoy the result!
description.cn: Jet-Black Rack is created for true connoisseurs of stylish furniture. Place your miners here and enjoy the result!

description.en: Think of a place built of stone and full of people, no roof. And now make it blast with applause!
description.cn: Think of a place built of stone and full of people, no roof. And now make it blast with applause!

description.en: I saved you a sunny spot. Come closer… I don't bite. Much.

description.en: Lord of lightning, ruler of the chain — this miner strikes with divine force. Every block falls like thunder, every reward a bolt from the cryptic heavens.

description.en: Venture deep into the bear market with BearHole, a miner that thrives where others hesitate. It digs through the toughest blocks, turning the cold, quiet downturns of the crypto winter into hidden treasures waiting to be uncovered.

description.en: Overflowing with warmth and fortune, this miner spreads crypto riches like heartfelt gifts. Each block unlocked is a token of affection, turning the blockchain into a never-ending love story of wealth and prosperity.

description.en: Rising above the sea with unstoppable force, the Amber Drakkar cuts through the waves like a blade of pure light. Its journey is one of glory, its wake a trail of treasures beyond imagination, waiting for those who dare to command its power
